remarks: Transfer universal quantification from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  (Contributed by FL, 10-Apr-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2014.)
statement:
ralxfrd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. C ) -> A e. B ) $.
ralxfrd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> E. y e. C x = A ) $.
ralxfrd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rexxfrd $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. B ps <-> E. y e. C ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
